title: AMERICA GOT URF AND OCE DIDNT!
body:
OMG did America get URF?
WTF oceanic riot why we got this stupid exerath thing and they get URF? thought it was pretty fun NO URF? WTF RIOT? {{champion:6}} to be kidding me? and the april fools prank made me very {{item:3070}}  coz i swear i had litteral dreams about playing in URF. in one i was {{champion:35}} with {{champion:56}}  and we were chasing a {{champion:80}}. I kept Q'ing to land my e and after 100 Q's (which comes really fast in URF) i landed it on him and {{champion:56}}  landed him fear then we rekt him and i started doing the worm then woke up. 

Anyways, to whom it may concern, i am a troubled league of legends playing and i do solemly hope Ultra Rapid Fire (URF) comes out soon. Though ascention was enjoyable and i hear a rumer poro king shall be live soon which is nice but still i wish to concern you to bring URF closer to me as i heard has been done in America

Yours Truely,
{{champion:115}} Pur3gh0st99
 p.s im not 5 as commented by my brother, i am of legal age to play league of legends

replies.body:
I'm just going to leave this here.

https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-IIOCs0s9R5o/Vwj8o-ZYHOI/AAAAAAAA5wM/8JcS1HIU6BkpUemautNqN6_5_U7CMYAgw/s1600/image.jpg
NA does not and has not had URF this year. PBE has URF because it is the testing server. Seph posted the schedule, all servers will be getting URF on the 22nd.
You were watching a pbe video fam bam

> [{quoted}](name=Ethiorius,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=KFLn4QXz,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-04-15T05:52:05.189+0000)
>
> Legend of the Poro King? ARE YOU SERIOUS! I JUST WANT URF! I {{item:3070}} EVERYTIME, GIVE US URF! URGGGHHHH
> 
> But anyway, keep up the great work Riot! Just give us URF!

It's next week -.- Maybe you can try reading sometimes

> [{quoted}](name=pur3 gh0st99,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=KFLn4QXz,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-04-14T11:25:31.461+0000) p.s im not 5 as commented by my brother, i am of legal age to play league of legends

I can't tell if this post is a troll.

I really, REALLY hope it is.
PBE mate, PBE. No region is getting any game mode that another does not (in regards to the rotating game modes).
